isRightPermitted

public boolean isRightPermitted(BaseRight right,
                                IPermissionEntity entity,
                                IPermisibleResource resource)
in-case for the entity and resource is the right available

Specified by:
isRightPermitted in interface IPermissionResolver
Parameters:
right - is BaseRight which is allowed or denied to be checked
entity - is IPermissionEntity which is allowed or denied is to be checked
resource - is IPermisibleResource for which the BaseRight is allowed or not to be checked
Returns:
true if the specified IPermissionEntity is allowed the BaseRight on the specified IPermisibleResource, false otherwise
See Also:
IPermissionRights.isRightPermitted(BaseRight)

setPermissionStore

public void setPermissionStore(IPermissionStoreAPI a_permissionStore)
Description copied from interface: IPermissionResolver
This will enable the resolver with a mechanism to get data from database.

Specified by:
setPermissionStore in interface IPermissionResolver
Parameters:
a_permissionStore - is instance of IPermissionStoreAPI, with which this resolver can get data.
